overview:
Eva Skorepova is Finance Director, responsible for financial operations.

Prior to Socialbakers, Eva was Finance Director of Remy Cointreau CR,SR(a distributor of well known bevarages brands like Remy Martin, Cointreau, Campari, Jaegermaster, Metaxa, Bols, etc.). Before Eva spent 3,5 years at Adobe as Finance Manager of EE, utilizing her 12-years experience as Finace Manager of EE at Autodesk, being with this company from the very beginning start-up phase since early 90â€˜s and participating on its expansion in both Czechia, Slovakia and Central Europe. Eva has a long term proven track of experience in economics, finance, tax, trade and labour law.
